fields.name: id
fields.description: anonymous ID number
fields.title: ID

fields.name: role
fields.description: role within the value chain
fields.title: role

fields.name: site
fields.description: location in Tanzania or Kenya where they were interviewed and where they primarily trade from
fields.title: site

fields.name: country
fields.description: country from which they operate
fields.title: country

fields.name: who_are_your_main_supplier_of_octopus_denoted_for_primary_supplier
fields.description: main i.e. primary supplier group for respondent
fields.title: primary supplier group

fields.name: gender_of_primary_supplier
fields.title: gender of primary supplier group

fields.name: location_of_primary_supplier
fields.title: location of primary supplier
fields.description: where their primary supplier group operates out of

fields.name: how_many_of_each_of_these_types_of_supplier_do_you_work_with_primary_supplier
fields.title: how many individuals within this supplier group do you trade with (for primary suppliers)

fields.name: simplified_how_many_of_each_of_these_types_of_supplier_do_you_work_with_primary_supplier
fields.title: simplified version (average) of how many individuals within this supplier group do you trade with (for primary suppliers)
fields.description: respondent's answer (if range) has been edited for the purpose of analysis. See column to the left for original answer

fields.name: how_long_have_your_worked_with_them_primary_supplier
fields.description: in years
fields.title: how long they have worked with primary suppliers

fields.name: average_number_of_years_worked_together_primary_supplier
fields.title: average number of years worked with primary supplier
fields.description: respondent's answer has been edited for the purpose of analysis. See column to the left for original answer.

fields.name: kazi_buying_price_from_primary_supplier_in_home_country_currency_kg
fields.title: for primary supplier what is the price they buy octopus at per kg in the currency of their home country during the Kazi season

fields.name: simplified_kazi_buying_price_from_primary_supplier_in_home_country_currency_kg
fields.title: for primary supplier what is the average price they buy octopus at per kg in the currency of their home country during the Kazi season
fields.description: respondent's answer has been edited if a range was given.  See column to the left for original answer

fields.name: simplified_kazi_buying_price_from_primary_supplier_in_usd_kg_using_september_2017_conversion_rates_of_2241_6882771832_tzs_to_1_usd_and_103_1033080415kes_to_1_usd_throughout_dataset
fields.title: for primary supplier what is the average price they buy octopus at per kg in USD during the Kazi season
fields.description: September 2017 conversion rates of 2241.6882771832 TZS to 1 USD and 103.1033080415 KES to 1 USD are used here and throughout the dataset

fields.name: average_kazi_quantity_purchased_from_primary_supplier_in_kg_per_month
fields.title: average quantity purchased from primary supplier in kg/month during kazi

fields.name: calculated_average_quantity_in_kg_purchased_from_primary_supplier_over_the_course_of_a_kazi_season_ie_six_months
fields.title: calculated average quantity purchased from primary supplier  in kg/kazi season
fields.description: this column is calculated by multiplying the column to the left by 6 months as kazi season= 6 months

fields.name: calculated_average_quantity_in_metric_tonnes_purchased_from_primary_supplier_over_the_course_of_a_kazi_season_month_ie_six_months
fields.description: his column is calculated by dividing the column to the left by 1000 as there are 1000kg in a metric tonne
fields.title: calculated average quantity in metric tonnes purchased from primary supplier over the course of a kazi season

fields.name: kusi_buying_price_from_primary_supplier_in_home_country_currency_kg
fields.title: for primary supplier what is the price they buy octopus at per kg in home country currency  during the Kusi season

fields.name: simplified_kusi_season_buying_price_from_primary_supplier_in_home_country_currency_kg
fields.description: respondent's answer has been edited for the purpose of analysis. by taking an average of a range if given. See column to the left for original answer.
fields.title: for primary supplier what is the average price they buy octopus at per kg in home country currency during the Kusi season

fields.name: simplified_kusi_season_buying_price_from_primary_supplier_in_usd_kg
fields.description: September 2017 conversion rates of 2241.6882771832 TZS to 1 USD and 103.1033080415 KES to 1 USD are used here and throughout the dataset
fields.title: simplified version of for primary supplier what is the average price they buy octopus at per kg in USD during the Kusi season

fields.name: calculated_average_quantity_in_kg_purchased_from_primary_supplier_over_the_course_of_a_kusi_season_month_ie_six_months
fields.description: this column is calculated by multiplying the column to the left by 6 months as kazi season= 6 months
fields.title: calculated average quantity purchased from primary supplier in kg/kusi season

fields.name: calculated_average_quantity_in_metric_tonnes_purchased_from_primary_supplier_over_the_course_of_a_kusi_season_month_ie_six_months
fields.description: this column is calculated by dividing the column to the left by 1000 as there are 1000kg in a metric tonne
fields.title: calculated average quantity in metric tonnes purchased from primary supplier over the course of a kusi season

fields.title: number of individuals in secondary supplier group

fields.title: for secondary supplier what is the prices they buy octopus at per kg in the currency of their home country during the Kazi season

fields.name: calculated_average_kazi_quantity_in_kg_per_month_from_secondary_supplier_group
fields.title: average quantity purchased from secondary supplier in kg/month during kazi season

fields.title: calculated average quantity in kg purchased from secondary supplier over the course of a kazi season

fields.name: calculated_average_kazi_season_quantity_in_kg_secondary_supplier_ie_6_months_in_metric_tonnes
fields.description: this column is calculated by dividing the column to the left by 1000 as there are 1000kg in a metric tonne"

fields.name: for_secondary_supplier_kusi_price_kg
fields.title: for secondary supplier what is the average price or price range they buy octopus at per kg in the currency of their home country during the Kusi season

fields.name: for_secondary_supplier_average_kusi_price_kg_in_home_country_currency
fields.description: simplified from column to the left by taking average of any range given
fields.title: simplified version of:  for secondary supplier what is the average price they buy octopus at per kg in the currency of their home country during the Kusi season

fields.name: calculated_yearly_quantity_traded_by_respondent_ie_kazi_quantity_from_primary_supplier_and_secondary_supplier_and_kusi_quantity_from_primary_supplier_and_secondary_supplier_in_metric_tonnes
fields.title: calculated yearly quantity traded by respondent
fields.description: this is calculated by adding up the per season quantity bought from secondary and primary suppliers during Kazi and Kusi seasons

fields.name: respondents_main_buyers
fields.title: primary buyers
fields.description: the main buyer groups of the respondent

fields.name: kazi_season_selling_price_to_buyers_in_home_country_currency_per_kg
fields.title: what is the price they sell octopus to these buyers per kg in the currency of their home country during the Kazi season

fields.name: simplified_kazi_season_selling_price_to_buyers_in_home_country_currency_per_kg
fields.description: if a price range was given for the column to the left here it has been simplified to give an average price they sell octopus to these buyers per kg in the currency of their home country during the Kazi season

fields.title: kusi season selling price to their buyers in home country currency per kg

fields.title: simplified kusi season selling price to their buyers in home country currency per kg
fields.description: simplified from column to the left by taking average of any range given

fields.name: simplified_kusi_season_selling_price_to_buyers_in_usd_kg
fields.title: simplified kusi season selling price to their buyers in USD per kg

fields.name: total_number_of_fishers_supplying_respondent_calculated_from_primary_supplier_and_secondary_supplier
fields.description: calculated from primary supplier and secondary supplier number columns plus supplier type
fields.title: total number of fishers supplying respondent

fields.name: total_number_of_traders_supplying_interviewee_calculated_from_primary_supplier_and_secondary_supplier
fields.description: calculated from primary supplier and secondary supplier number columns plus supplier type
fields.title: total number of traders supplying respondent

fields.name: total_number_of_suppliers_calculated_from_summing_primary_and_secondary_supplier
fields.description: calculated from primary supplier and secondary supplier number columns
fields.title: total number of supplier supplying respondent

name: east-africa-octopus-trade-middlemen
title: East Africa Octopus Trade Middlemen Price and Quantity Data
description: East Africa Octopus Trade Middlemen Price and Quantity Data collected during August and September 2017 in Kenya and Tanzania
